OOC: The sound of Hollywood Narrator typing a post woke up the neighborhood=
. People called the cops.

BIC:

Arrow had watched the events with indiffer=
ence. He had certain laws he abided by. His own twisted laws. One of those =
was not to question what his fellow bot did. And he hadn't done so, yet. Ba=
ck in his days with the Radicons, when he had received the lobotomy from th=
e leader of the group, Kracken, he still never questioned any orders or act=
ions. When a comrade made a mistake, he would let it play out, and when an =
enemy made a mistake, he would take quick action and harm them quickly and =
efficiently. Sneaky kills were obviously not against his law, as he recalls=
 right at the moment how he had ripped the spark from the body of the very =
child he had cared for in the Chivtrons. He considered it a merciful act.

=
Deemos, meanwhile, was quite shocked by the events. He thought it was disgu=
sting and inappropriate. This was hypocrisy, as Deemos was the one who had =
sliced a team member to bits just for not doing better in battle when Deemo=
s led his own group. He briefly recalls Shokaract co-leading his group and =
almost becomes glad, for some unknown reason, but then puts his attention b=
ack on the events at hand. His optics lit up brightly when Heartbreak had k=
issed Phoenix and thrown her down. He knew the previous events would be com=
monplace, but he thought this was going too far. However, this thought came=
 from the guy who had plotted viciously killing his wife and son and had su=
cceeded.

Spider, meanwhile, had the third point of view. He was proud and =
smiling. He enjoyed everything that went on. He was a rookie bot who was ea=
ger for action and any sort of exciting event, no matter what kind.

Meanwh=
ile, a couple of STASIS PODS (I'm sick of ships) fall down on the planet. W=
hat will they become? What sides will they be on? Does anyone care?...

  -=
---- Original Message -----
  From: Richard Allen
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com
  Sent: Sunday, February 16, 2003 5:09 PM
  Subject: Party at nWo base!=



  : : Wolfenstein/Razor/Diesel/Heartbreak : :

  Wolfenstein gets out of=
 the CR chamber. He had been changed to white and black and now sported the=
 nWo logo. He headed back to the cell block.

  Diesel had grown impatient =
with Hollywood, and got the branding torch himself. He handed it to Razor.
=

  HBK let the forcefield to the cell down and all nWo members steped in fp=
r the party.

  Heartbreak and Diesel took hold of Phoenix's arms from behi=
nd, holding her in place.

  Razor activated the torch, with a evil grin on=
 his face. He stepped forward very slowly, surely scaring the femme bot.

 =
 Razor: Now my dear, you will belong to us. If you... service us you may li=
ve. If you refuse, I'll kill you where you stand.

  Razor reached out with=
 the torch and began to ingrave letters into the beautiful body of Phoenix.=
 She would surely be screaming from the pain, as the energon flame burnt th=
rough her armor, melting pieces of her away. As Razor finished, Phoenix had=
 the nWo logo burned across her chest. She had been branded.

  All the boy=
s started to laugh at what they had done. All except Wolfenstein, who looke=
d away. There were almost tears in his eyes. This wasn't right, she didn't =
deserve this. The physical damage could be repaired but mentaly? Could anyo=
ne recover from an event like this?

  No time had passed from the branding=
 before Heartbreak took action. He grabbed Phoenix bringing the hot femme t=
o him, roughly. He was grabbing hard, probably hurting her. He kissed her u=
nwilling form, before throwing her down with great force.

  Heartbreak: I'=
m going to like this!

  The preceding has been paid for by the

  New Worl=
d Order





  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of =
Service. 



--------------------------------------------------------------=
----------------
